game.ai.shared.player.factory.specification

Interface IPairsPlayerFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPairsPlayerFactory, HumanAIPairsPlayerFactory, TwoAIPairsPlayerFactory, TwoHumanPairsPlayerFactory

    public interface IPairsPlayerFactory
    This class is an interface to create PairsPlayerSpecification
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    btdiem
